body_html:
So at step 40, the memory usage and run time per training step is like this:
step: 40
read image cost: 96s
step cost: 151s
Memory usage: 7049

By restarting the training both memory usage and run time drop:
step: 40
read image cost: 37s
step cost: 72s
Memory usage: 4832

I will investigate on this.

body:
So at step 40, the memory usage and run time per training step is like this:
step: 40
read image cost: 96s
step cost: 151s
Memory usage: 7049

By restarting the training both memory usage and run time drop:
step: 40
read image cost: 37s
step cost: 72s
Memory usage: 4832

I will investigate on this.
